GET.description: Get event by id. Omit the id to get all public events or auth and post parameters for advanced options.

PATCH.description: Modify and existing event. Only pass the parameters you need changed. Omitted parameters will remain the same.

DELETE.description: Delete an event. This method fully deletes the event. Use PATCH to mark an event as cancelled.

POST.description: Add a new venue. This does not add the venue to https://venues.cashmusic.org/.

GET.description: Get venue by id. Omit the id to get all user-added venues.

PATCH.description: Modify and existing venue. Only pass the parameters you need changed. Omitted parameters will remain the same. This does not affect the venue on https://venues.cashmusic.org/.

DELETE.description: Delete a user-defined venue. This does not affect venues pulled from https://venues.cashmusic.org/.

GET.description: Returns an array of all matching venues.

addvenue.description: Add a new user-defined venue. This does not add the venue to https://venues.cashmusic.org/.

deleteevent.description: Delete an event. This removes it from the system entirely. Use editevent to mark an event as cancelled.

deletevenue.description: Delete a user-defined venue. This does not affect venues pulled from https://venues.cashmusic.org/.

editevent.description: Edit an event. Only pass the parameters you need changed. Omitted parameters will remain the same.

editvenue.description: Edit a new user-defined venue. Only pass the parameters you need changed. Omitted parameters will remain the same. This does not affect the venue on https://venues.cashmusic.org/.

findvenues.description: Returns an array of all matching venues.

getallvenues.description: Lists all venues. Yeah I'm not going to lie â€” this is dumb.

getevents.description: Returns an array of all matching events.

geteventsnostatus.description: Returns an array of all matching events, without having to specify status. *cough* Refactor this. *cough*
